articles.title: Tech giant Apple confirms manufacturing iPhone 13 in India - Business Insider India
articles.description:
1. Tech giant Apple confirms manufacturing iPhone 13 in India  Business Insider India
  2. iPhone 13 is latest Apple model to be made in India  Economic Times
  3. Made-in-india Iphone 13 Soon As Apple Starts Production In Chennai | Mint  Mint …
articles.content:
In a major fillip to India
's dream to become a global manufacturing hub, Apple
 on Monday confirmed it has started manufacturing its top-selling iPhone 13 smartphone in India.
